channel.title: Android on Sudeep's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Sudeep's Blog

item.title: 'Constitution of Nepal' Android App
item.description: It’s been so great to feel that the Constitution of Nepal has finally arrived. Congratulations to all the Nepalese. May this Constitution brings peace, prosperity and rapid development in the country is the wish of all the Nepalese.

item.title: Jhandi Munda (Langur Burja) - Mobile Game
item.description: Jhandi Munda is a gambling game played mostly in South Asian countries including Nepal, India, Bangladesh and Myanmar. It is also known with a different name in different regions such as “Langur Burja”, “Jhanda Burja” and “Khor Khore” or “Khod khode”. I have developed a Mobile game based on this.
